message: Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
I appreciate the offer of an even split, but I'm aiming for a slightly better outcome.  This seems fair considering the inflation working against me.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a little more to make this worth it for me.  This offer is closer to a fair split after the inflation.
Alice, we're getting close. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers to get this settled.
